metadata.title: CVE-2021-41868 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
OnionShare 2.3 before 2.4 allows remote unauthenticated attackers to uploadfiles on a non-public node when using the --receive functionality.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-41868` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

onionshare - 2.6-1
onionshare-cli - 2.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: onionshare package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6-1').
